ARIEL RIOS FEDERAL BUILDING; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 73

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Designating the Federal building located at 99 New York Avenue, N.E., in the District of Columbia as the ``Ariel Rios Federal Building''
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 4957, to designate the Federal building located at 99 New York Avenue, N.E., in the District of Columbia as the ``Ariel Rios Federal Building'', by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 401 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 180;

extension.searchTitle: OPIOID PROGRAM EVALUATION ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 162, No. 73

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 5052, amended, to direct the Attorney General and the Secretary of Health and Human Services to evaluate the effectiveness of grant programs that provide grants for the primary purpose of providing assistance in addressing problems pertaining to opioid abuse, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 410 yeas to 1 nay, Roll No. 181;
